solution_line_template: There are {num_rows} * {seats_per_row} = <<{num_rows}*{seats_per_row}={total_seats}>>{total_seats} seats on this bus.

After the first stop, there are {initial_boarded}+{first_stop_boarded} - {first_stop_got_off} = <<{initial_boarded}+{first_stop_boarded}-{first_stop_got_off}={people_after_first}>>{people_after_first} people on the bus.

After the 2nd stop, there are {people_after_first}+{second_stop_boarded} - {second_stop_got_off} = <<{people_after_first}+{second_stop_boarded}-{second_stop_got_off}={people_after_second}>>{people_after_second} people on the bus.
So there are {total_seats} - {people_after_second} = <<{total_seats}-{people_after_second}={empty_seats}>>{empty_seats} empty seats on the bus after the 2nd stop.
